message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value, and I'm asking for $20,000. What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is below its true value. Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still can't meet you at $17,500. I would like to stick to my initial offer of $15,000. If this doesn't work, I will consider buying the product from John.
